value.description: The value of the secret. This will be encrypted at rest and redacted in any API responses.

variablePref.description: A variable to add to the sandbox

value.description: The value of the variable. This will be visible in API responses and should not contain sensitive information.

filePref.description: A file to add to the sandbox

encrypt.description: Whether the file content should be encrypted at rest and redacted in API responses. This is useful for files that may contain sensitive information.

path.description: The path within the sandbox where the file will be created, e.g. '/app/config.json'. If not provided, the file will be created in the root directory of the sandbox.

volumePref.description: A volume to add to the sandbox

path.description: The mount path within the sandbox where the volume will be attached, e.g. '/data', '/logs', etc.

readOnly.description: Whether the volume should be mounted as read-only
